title: Westside Lounge
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cocktail bar, lounge, and restaurant established 2010. offering a separate vegan menu as of Jan 2014 with dishes like fried noodle with tofu and veggies, millet with veggies and tofu, Thai curry with rice, and pasta. Has vegan wines available. No dress code.
